programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudana climtica que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaa mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Tuff Turf: O Rebelde, (1985, Drama)
programme.desc: Prestes a terminar o terceiro ano do segundo grau, Morgan se v obrigado a mudar de estilo de vida passando a frequentar os subrbios da cidade onde vive, ao invs do clube de garotos ricos.

programme.title: Eu, Christiane F. - 13 Anos, Drogada e Prostituda, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos anos 1970, em Berlim, uma adolescente se torna viciada em herona. Tudo em sua vida comea a distorcer e lentamente desaparece medida que ela se torna amiga de um pequeno grupo de viciados e se apaixona por um viciado em drogas.

programme.title: 41 DP - Inferno no Bronx, (1981, Crime)
programme.desc: Este interessante e pouco lembrado drama policial trs Paul Newman no papel do veterano policial Murphy que atua no bairro do Bronx, lugar extremamente violento nos anos setenta e oitenta.

programme.title: Temporada de Caa, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Wade Whitehouse um policial de uma pequena cidade. Isolado das pessoas ao seu redor, incluindo um pai dominador e uma mulher divorciada, ele se torna obcecado com a resoluo de um acidente de caa fatal, levando a uma srie de acontecimentos trgicos.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de anos afastado dos amigos e familiares, produtor musical com a vida pessoal e profissional em frangalhos volta para casa na Carolina do Norte para cuidar do pai doente, num difcil reencontro com questes do passado.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Jamie era a ltima pessoa por quem Landon se apaixonaria. Muito sria e conservadora para seu gosto, filha de um pastor de igreja batista.

programme.title: Os Meninos que Enganavam Nazistas, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois irmos judeus fogem por toda a Frana durante a ocupao alem na Segunda Guerra Mundial, tentando encontrar sua famlia novamente.

programme.title: E Se... Voc Tivesse Uma Segunda Chance?, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: H 15 anos, Ben Walker deixou sua namorada, sua cidade e seu ministrio por uma oportunidade de negcios. Agora ele tem uma slida carreira e uma noiva. Um dia ele visitado por um anjo que mostra como seria sua vida se ele tivesse seguido seu chamado.

programme.title: Correndo por Um Sonho, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de Michelle Payne, a primeira jquei feminina a vencer a Melbourne Cup.

programme.title: Acima das Nuvens, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: H 20 anos, Maria ficou famosa por sua interpretao no teatro. Agora, ela tem que enfrentar o fato de que uma jovem estrela de Hollywood ir interpretar o mesmo papel. Alm disso, ela convidada a dividir o palco com a novata, mas em outro papel.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: H 60 anos um monge tibetano protege um pergaminho que tem a chave para o poder ilimitado. Prestes a se aposentar, precisa de um substituto, e o principal candidato Kar, um malandro que acaba por salvar o monge de bandidos atrs do pergaminho.

programme.title: A Recompensa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps passar 12 anos na priso, o famoso arrombador de cofres Dom Hemingway volta para as ruas de Londres em busca da sua recompensa por ter ficado de boca fechada durante todo esse tempo. Ao lado do amigo Dickie, ele faz uma visita ao chefe do crime.

programme.title: Trfico de Mulheres, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Trs jovens mulheres, da Amrica, da Nigria e da ndia, so vtimas do trfico de mulheres, sendo escravizadas para a prtica de prostituio. O lucro pode ser de centenas de bilhes de dlares anualmente, superando o das maiores empresas do mundo.

programme.title: Instinto Materno, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps trauma, uma me solteira se muda com a filha para uma isolada fazenda no interior. Mas logo coisas sinistras voltam a acontecer e seus instintos maternos so colocados prova novamente.

programme.title: O Dono da Festa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Van Wilder ficou famoso na cidade por organizar as melhores festas da faculdade. Porm, o veterano forado a mudar sua rotina de sete anos aps perder a mesada do pai, deixando as festividades com os dias contados.

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades.

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio.

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: The Yards, (2000, Crime)
programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Marlowe, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlowe, a gripping thriller set in 1939 LA. Hard-boiled private eye, Philip Marlowe, is hired to find the lover of a glamorous heiress. Unexpectedly, Marlowe finds himself embroiled in a deadly mystery that he's determined to either solve or die trying.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.desc: After being released from prison, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan). Leo soon finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs, and even murder.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Find Me Guilty, (2006, Drama)

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the ongoing fight for supremacy between mankind and the human-alien hybrids, a fatal hybrid weakness has given humans the advantage. Until now.

programme.title: Fire In The Sky, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 1975, logger Travis Walton (D.B. Sweeney) and his co-workers discovered a hovering UFO. Walton's pals fled, but Walton was not so fortunate. Whisked aboard the strange craft, he was subjected to a painful, unearthly medical study.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the ongoing fight for supremacy between mankind and the human-alien hybrids, a fatal hybrid weakness has given humans the advantage. Until now.

programme.desc: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer (Richard Gere) who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy (Edward Norton) accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.

programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.desc: Golden Globe winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gruesome scene adorns a pier in San Pedro, south of Los Angeles. Twenty-seven dead bodies. A burned-out ship smoldering in the harbor.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Crime)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Hair, (1979, Musical)
programme.desc: A country boy and Vietnam draftee embark on an adventure of a lifetime when he meets a group of counterculture hippies and his eyes are opened to the darker side of class, race, and big city life in this adaptation of the Broadway sensation.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Coffy, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and his robed rival rages on, Yusei must rely on his deck if he plans to survive this Shadow Duel and uncover the truth behind the Dark Signers sinister scheme to destroy the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After agreeing to help Yusei meet with Director Goodwin, Officer Trudge unknowingly becomes one of the Dark Signers' drones and challenges a wounded Jack Atlas to a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to gain Yusei's trust, Director Goodwin decides to share with him the secrets behind the origin of the Satellite Sector and the ongoing war between Signer and Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After returning to the Satellite Sector, Yusei meets up with his old friend Crow and soon finds himself in a tag team Turbo Duel with Sector Security.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei and Crow set off to confront the Dark Signers in an effort to stop them from destroying the Satellite Sector.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Leo is forced to take part in an extrasensory examination with the leader of the Arcadia Movement. Can Leo pass this pop quiz, or will this psychic showdown with Sayer leave Leo locked up forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Lazar's creepy clowns about to crack Crow's defense, Crow hatches a plan to lull his opponent into a false sense of security so that his feathered friends can swoop in and swipe the last of Lazar's life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Luna searches the Spirit World for a way to free Ancient Fairy Dragon from her stone prison, Leo searches his deck for a card combo that will help him defeat Devack and his army of apes.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Luna and her new found friend Torunka hatch a plan to free Regulus from King Zeman's minus curse. Meanwhile, back in the Satellite Sector, Leo calls upon his Power Tool Dragon to help him dismantle Devack's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Luna's plan to free Ancient Fairy Dragon falls apart, Regulus must come to her rescue in order to save her and the Spirit World from Zeman's minus curse.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Carly sets out hoping to uncover the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon, but after digging up some damaging dirt on the Arcadia Movement, she soon finds herself squaring off in a psychic duel with Sayer.

programme.desc: Sayer signs up for a Shadow Duel against a Dark Signer who's out for revenge while Akiza agrees to battle a dark and sinister supermodel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the Dark Signer double duel draws to a climactic close, Carly and Misty unfold a catastrophic card combo that could send Akiza and Sayer to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Signers presses on, Yusei turns to his trusty Stardust Dragon in an effort to keep the power of Akiza's Black Rose Dragon at bay.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Yusei, Jack, Akiza and Luna all gathered together, Director Goodwin seizes the moment and decides to shed some light on the dark and formidable foes the four Signers will soon be battling.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to rid the Satellite Sector of the Dark Signers, Crow ventures out and challenges a sinister looking sneak to a duel.

programme.desc: As the rematch between Kalin and Yusei continues, Yusei must find a way to out-think and out-maneuver the dark power of Kalin's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him to the Netherworld forever.

programme.desc: Roman challenges Yusei to a Shadow Duel at the site of the original Ener-D Reactor. Meanwhile, Director Goodwin decides to make an unexpected visit to the Satellite Sector to settle some unfinished business he has with his Dark Signer brother.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Roman rages on, Roman takes a time out to reveal the truth behind the original Ener-D Reactor's meltdown and the role Yusei's father played.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack agrees to Turbo Duel Carly in an effort to defeat the darkness that has taken control of her. Can Jack rid the evil that has come to possess this one-time roving reporter?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack kicks his duel into overdrive and summons his Red Dragon Archfiend in a desperate attempt to free Carly from the Dark Signers' control.

programme.title: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!

programme.title: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!

programme.title: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre's group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!

programme.title: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!

programme.title: Otama's temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido's Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.title: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.title: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin'emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin'emon's ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!

programme.title: Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!

programme.title: Kin'emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke's mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!

programme.title: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!

programme.title: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!

programme.title: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed's back to her home.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!

programme.title: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill Thunder Bagua!

programme.title: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!

programme.desc: War on a grand scale has erupted among the stars! Only the impending battle between two men of power and destiny can overshadow the carnage to come.

programme.title: Glass Fleet
programme.desc: Michel Volban's desperate search for one that would lead the People's Army to freedom and Cleo's solemn vow to return the Royal Family to glory were at once one path and also untangled.

programme.title: Glass Fleet
programme.desc: Cleo stirs from his battered slumber in the depths of a dank prison cell. Bruised but alive, the revolution is now on hold.

programme.title: Dementia 13, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A mysterious masked killer terrorizes members of a family at a secluded estate.

programme.title: The Forest, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of her twin sister, a young American (Natalie Dormer) encounters the tormented spirits of Japan's mysterious and legendary Aokigahara Forest.

programme.title: Games, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A mysterious woman (Simone Signoret) in black moves in with married Manhattan thrill-seekers (James Caan, Katharine Ross) and helps one trick the other.

programme.title: Gone, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A televangelist (Gregory Itzin) influences a confrontational man (Billy Burke) motivated by revenge.

programme.title: The Green Inferno, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Student activists (Lorenza Izzo, Ariel Levy) crash-land in the Amazon and encounter an indigenous tribe of cannibals who'd like to have them for dinner.

programme.title: The Guardian, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Yuppies (Dwier Brown, Carey Lowell) with a baby hire a nanny (Jenny Seagrove), a druid witch who sacrifices babies to a tree.

programme.title: The Hitcher II: I've Been Waiting, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: A psychopathic hitchhiker (Jake Busey) terrorizes a man (C. Thomas Howell) and his girlfriend (Kari Wuhrer) as they take a road trip.

programme.title: I Saw What You Did, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Two teenage girls, bored while baby-sitting, make prank phone calls, completely unaware one of the people on the other end of the line has just killed his wife and now thinks the girls must be silenced.

programme.title: Incarnate, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: Recruited by a Vatican emissary (Catalina Sandino Moreno), an exorcist (Aaron Eckhart) taps into the subconscious mind of a tormented boy (David Mazouz) to free him from demonic possession.

programme.title: Karma, (1970, Paranormal)
programme.desc: When recent college grad Manny has trouble making ends meet, his father-in-law offers him a job evicting delinquent tenants. Manny soon finds himself unleashing a karma demon which stalks him at every turn.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this spell-binding thriller as the Chief of Police of a small town who finds himself caught in the eye of a storm as he investigates the murder of a woman he was secretly seeing.because all the evidence points to him!

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: February 26 and 27, 2000, the Original Kings of Comedy play Charlotte, NC. The themes are Blacks and Whites, men and women, old-school and hip-hop.

programme.title: The Queens Of Comedy, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: They're loud, proud and outrageously funny - they're The Queens of Comedy, captured live onstage in Memphis during their triumphant comedy tour!

programme.title: DYSFUNKTIONAL FAMILY, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: The always outrageous comedian Eddie Griffin brings the funk to his thoroughly hilarious family reunion in this revealing and wildly entertaining comedy gem!

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A mockumentary chronicling the rise and fall of NWH, a not particularly talented--or particularly bright but always controversial--hip-hop group.

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: February 26 and 27, 2000, the Original Kings of Comedy play Charlotte, NC. The themes are Blacks and Whites, men and women, old-school and hip-hop.

programme.title: The Queens Of Comedy, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: They're loud, proud and outrageously funny - they're The Queens of Comedy, captured live onstage in Memphis during their triumphant comedy tour!

programme.title: DYSFUNKTIONAL FAMILY, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: The always outrageous comedian Eddie Griffin brings the funk to his thoroughly hilarious family reunion in this revealing and wildly entertaining comedy gem!

programme.title: Clannad
programme.desc: Tomoya falls asleep at school only to awake to the sound of Kotomi playing the violin. A girl from the music room lent Kotomi the violin and wants everyone to hear her.

programme.title: Clannad
programme.desc: Kyou tries to purchase a stuffed elephant for Kotomi's upcoming birthday. Just as Kyou is about to give up, Fuuko appears and convinces her to give Kotomi a star instead.

programme.title: Clannad
programme.desc: Seeing Kotomi standing on newspaper clippings sparks Tomoya's childhood memories. Kotomi and Tomoya recall their childhood friendship, and Kotomi explores her feelings.

programme.title: Clannad
programme.desc: Tomoya falls asleep in the garden after working through the night. A mysterious stranger waits for Kotomi at school with the intention to steal her parents' thesis.

programme.title: Clannad
programme.desc: After she speaks with Toshio Koumura about becoming an adviser for their club, Nagisa recevies a letter to stop the theater club.

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: Soma has his first showdown with his dad in months. With Isshiki, Megumi, and Fumio judging this morning match, will this finally be Soma's first victory?
programme.sub-title: The Cook Who Traveled Thousands of Miles

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: Over the break, Yukihira challenges a popular fried chicken shop to save his old shopping district. He's found a taste tester, but who can he call to help develop the recipe?

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: Soma and his team work on a tasty, original and portable dish to combat the Mozuya invasion. They'll have to make their mark on the Sumire shopping district or watch it fall.

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: The lists for the Fall Selection are out! When the topic is announced, Soma seeks out a former colleague of his father's and finds more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Food Wars!
programme.desc: There's no summer break for the Fall Selection participants! Soma and the others work to enhance their dishes over the six weeks before they head into the prelims.
programme.sub-title: Dragon Lies Prone then Ascends to the Sky

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: The annual school festival is getting closer and the Light Music club will be performing again... however, Mio and Ritsu get into an argument.

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: Yui catches a fever and is unable to practice for the festival. The club feels uneasy performing without her, but in the end everyone puts on a great performance.

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: Yui wants to enjoy hot soup with the other girls, but they're all busy! Will Yui be forced to spend the cold winter holiday alone?

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: Ritsu's old middle school friend invites the band to perform at a live house on New Year's Eve. How will the evening pan out?

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: Yui, Mio, Ritsu, and Tsumugi are all in the same class and members of the same music club. They want to bring in more members so their friend Azusa won't be the club's only member once they all graduate.

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: The girls find an old guitar that ends up being worth a lot of money. The girls purchase a selfless gift for their friend.

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: Ritsu decides she doesn't want to be the drummer anymore. She wants to be in the spotlight.

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: The light music club seniors go on a school field trip to Kyoto.

programme.title: K-ON!
programme.desc: Azusa and Ui, along with their classmate Jun, spend time together while the third years are on their trip to Kyoto. Noticing that Ui would be lonely without her sister around, Jun and Azusa decide to sleepover at her house.

programme.title: Non Non Biyori: I Made Something Incredible
programme.desc: Beep boop! Koma-plushie is live, boop beep! But Hotaru isn't a master of robotics just yet.

programme.title: Non Non Biyori: We All Went Camping Together

programme.title: Non Non Biyori: It Was a Thrilling Autumn
programme.desc: Parents' Day provides Natsumi a particular variety of anxiety, but she finds a way to relax when Renge brings home a new friend.

programme.sub-title: It Got Cold and Then Hot

programme.title: Non Non Biyori: I Got Drunk and Remembered

programme.title: Non Non Biyori: The Cherry Blossoms Bloomed Again

programme.title: Helck

programme.title: Helck

programme.title: Helck

programme.title: Helck

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, Franois Berland, Jeroen Krabb, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: O Preo do Amanh, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Em um futuro onde as pessoas param de envelhecer aos 25 anos, o dinheiro pode comprar juventude imortal. Gneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Justin Timberlake, Olivia Wilde, Shyloh Oostwald, Johnny Galecki, Colin McGurk Diretor: Andrew Niccol

programme.title: Clube da Luta, (1999)
programme.desc: 1999. Um homem deprimido conhece um fabricante de sabonetes, e juntos formam um clube de luta clandestino que evolui para algo inesperado. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier, Richmond Arquette Diretor: David Fincher

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010)

programme.title: 2020. Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi - T01E18

programme.title: 2020. Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve - T01E19

programme.title: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe voltam Aldeia Oculta da Folha depois da batalha do Pas das Ondas. Mesmo concluindo novas misses, Naruto est insatisfeito com a rotina diria, mas logo ele descobre que estrangeiros esto se juntando na Aldeia da Folha. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: A Prova Chunin - T01E20

programme.title: 2020. Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura so escolhidos para fazer a Prova Chunin. Iruka se ope participao dos trs, pois os considera muito novos e inexperientes para o desafio. Kakashi, porm, acredita que eles cresceram e esto mais prontos do que nunca. Gneros: Anime
programme.desc: Naruto: Identifique-Se : Novos E Poderosos Rivais - T01E21

programme.title: 2020. Enquanto Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se preparam para a prova, um ninja chamado Rock Lee aparece. Lee quer lutar contra Sasuke, que possui o poder do cl Uchiha. Sasuke aceita o desafio de Lee, mas fica s na defesa devido aos ataques rpidos desse oponente. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto: O Desafio Chunin:Rock Lee Contra Sasuke - T01E22

programme.title: 2020. Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura se inscrevem oficialmente para a Prova Chunin e formam um time. Para passar, nenhum membro pode falhar. Gneros: Anime
programme.sub-title: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam
programme.desc: Naruto: A Batalha Genin, Os Nove Novatos Se Enfrentam - T01E23

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta - T01E40
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus - T01E36
programme.sub-title: Clone Contra Clone: Os Meus So Melhores Que Os Seus
programme.desc: 2020. O time de Naruto se junta a Kabuto, mas eles so presos por um genjutsu (tcnica ilusria). Eles caminham na mesma rea vrias vezes, perdem energia e lutam contra os vrios clones criados pela tcnica. Naruto os derrota, mas o nmero no diminui. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez - T01E37
programme.sub-title: Sobrevivendo Ao Corte: Os Nove Novatos Juntos Outra Vez
programme.desc: 2020. Quando Naruto e seu time chegam a torre e abrem os dois pergaminhos, Iruka aparece e explica o esprito do ninja chunin (nvel mdio) aos estudantes da Academia Ninja. Agora ele confia em Naruto e seu time. Anko fala com o Hokage sobre Orochimaru. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao! - T01E38
programme.sub-title: Estreitando O Campo, Morte Sbita, Eliminao!
programme.desc: 2020. Os 21 ninjas que passaram na segunda parte da prova se juntam para o prximo desafio. Seus rostos demonstram vrias emoes profundas. Mas como um nmero muito alto passou na segunda prova, as preliminares da terceira comearo imediatamente... Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: O Cime Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Lees Se Solta! - T01E39
programme.sub-title: O Cime Do Sobrancelhudo, A Rajada De Lees Se Solta!
programme.desc: 2020. Na terceira prova os combates so um contra um. O primeiro entre Sasuke e Yoroi, o capanga de Orochimaru. Yoroi encurrala Sasuke, que no consegue usar seu Sharingan por causa da Marca da Maldio no pescoo. Yoroi absorve o chakra para fora de Sasuke. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara - T01E40
programme.sub-title: Kakashi E Orochimaru Cara A Cara
programme.desc: 2020. Kakashi desfaz o feitio de Sasuke, e Orochimaru aparece. Ele quer o poder de Sharingan que o cl Uchiha possui. Nas preliminares da terceira prova, Zaku da Aldeia Escondida do Som luta contra Shino da Aldeia Oculta da Folha. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Death Note - T01E01
programme.desc: 2007. O brilhante, mas entediado estudante da escola Light Yagami encontra-se mantendo o poder da vida e da morte em suas mos, o Death Note. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, Jos Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki

programme.title: Death Note - T01E02
programme.desc: 2007. Enquanto os criminosos do mundo continuam a morrer, L atende representantes de vrias naes. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, Jos Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki

programme.title: Death Note - T01E03

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia - T01E41
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: 2007. Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki - T01E42
programme.desc: 2008. A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura - T01E43
programme.desc: 2008. Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha - T01E44
programme.desc: 2008. Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio - T01E45
programme.desc: 2008. Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam - T01E41
programme.sub-title: Exploso Kunoichi: As Rivais Se Enfrentam
programme.desc: 2020. O prximo combate entre o membro do time de Gaara, Kankuro, e o capanga de Orochimaru, Misumi. Misumi captura Kankuro, usando um corpo que consegue deslocar suas partes e juntas. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: A Batalha Final: Cha! - T01E42
programme.desc: 2020. O quarto combate entre Sakura e Ino, amigas de infncia e ambas apaixonadas por Sasuke. Embora Sakura tenha admirado Ino desde pequena, ela no hesita em enfrent-la, e as duas ninjas aparentam ter o mesmo nvel e determinao. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trmulo Shikamaru - T01E43
programme.sub-title: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trmulo Shikamaru
programme.desc: 2020. O quinto combate entre Tenten e Temari. Tenten, mestre em armas areas e vrias outras, que so repelidas pelo leque de Temari. O sexto combate entre Shikamaru e Kin. Kin parece estar em vantagem, mas Shikamaru usa seu Jutsu Possesso da Sombra. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro? - T01E44
programme.sub-title: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro?
programme.desc: 2020. No stimo combate, Naruto enfrenta Kiba, que traz seu cachorro Akamaru. Kiba usa o Jutsu Quatro Patas para atacar Naruto, que consegue virar a mesa. Entretanto, Akamaru e Kiba consomem Plulas de Comida e comeam um ataque intenso contra Naruto. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto - T01E45
programme.sub-title: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto
programme.desc: 2020. Depois de consumir Plulas de Comida, os nveis de chakra de Kiba e Akamaru aumentam, e ambos comeam a contra-atacar Naruto. Naruto usa Jutsu de Transformao contra Kiba e tenta ganhar com uma nova manobra secreta. O que ser que Naruto planejou?! Gneros: Anime

programme.title: 2005. Os cidados de Water Seven e uma tempestade sem precedentes se aproxima. Chopper e Sanji descobrem o paradeiro de Robin, mas recebem notcias alarmantes. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Mayumi Tanaka [Luffy], Kazuya Nakai [Zoro], Akemi Okamura [Nami] Diretor: Knosuke Uda, Munehisa Sakai
programme.sub-title: O Adeus Eterno?! Nico Robin, A Mulher Que Atrai as Trevas!

programme.title: 2001. Tyson Granger percebe que est atrasado para uma batalha de Beyblade com Andrew, o melhor Beyblader da cidade. Antes que Tyson chegue l, um Blade Shark chamado Carlos luta e o derrota, pegando sua lmina. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E01

programme.title: 2001. Tyson rapidamente perde sua batalha com Kai. Andrew e Kenny informam que os Blade Sharks esto procurando o melhor Bit Beast que ningum pode vencer. Andrew, Kenny e Tyson reconstroem o Bey de Tyson. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E02

programme.title: 2001. Tyson e Kenny conhecem Max, o garoto novo da cidade, pouco antes de um filhote ser levado para uma cachoeira. Tyson tenta salv-lo, mas falha. Max ento tenta e consegue. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E03

programme.title: 2001. O torneio regional de qualificao da Beyblade comea quando Tyson, Max e at Kenny entram para ver se conseguem destronar Kai, o atual campeo. Max ganha seu bloco e avana para a final. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E04

programme.title: 2001. Nas semifinais, Max enfrenta Kai, o campeo. Tyson espera lutar com Ray, um invicto Blader. O prato baseado como uma torre, para ficar no topo por 10 segundos como voc ganha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E05

programme.title: 2001. A batalha final das semifinais Tyson contra Ray, um invicto Blader. Kenny est trabalhando em algo e no est l na primeira rodada. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E06

programme.title: 2001. Tyson, Max e Kenny esto trabalhando em Dragoon para garantir a vitria nas finais quando o vov interrompe e revela a Tyson que seu 13 aniversrio! Aps a festa, a primeira rodada termina rapidamente, com Tyson derrotando Kai inesperadamente. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E07

programme.title: 2001. Enquanto Tyson, Kai, Max, Kenny e Ray voam para Hong Kong para se preparar para o torneio asitico, Kai "sai" do time e caminha pelas ruas. O resto da equipe tenta segui-lo e falha quando ouvem um Bey girando. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E08

programme.title: 2001. Kevin discorda dos BladeBreakers especialmente Ray e desafia Ray para uma batalha. Tyson j teve o suficiente e luta com Kevin, mas ele cai rapidamente na capacidade do Bey de balanar e se multiplicar. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E09

programme.title: 2001. O Torneio Asitico BBA est em andamento, no auge de uma torre inacreditavelmente alta na China. Os BladeBreakers e os White Tigers percebem que acabaro lutando entre si, e usam isso um contra o outro. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Marlowe Gardiner-Heslin, Alex Hood, Gage Knox Diretor: Toshifumi Kawase
programme.desc: Beyblade - T01E10

programme.title: 2023. Um j era. S faltam mais dois! Com a perda de Tristan, Serenity est arrasada. Ser que ela consegue se recuperar e se lembrar das lies que Tristan lhe ensinou para reverter o duelo? Tristan pode ter se ido, mas deixou um presente... Gneros: Anime Diretor: Kunihisa Sugishima, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Toru Yamada
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T03E10

programme.title: 2023. Tristan est de volta, mas no parece ser quem quando sequestra Mokuba! Hora de Kaiba parar de brincar e resgatar seu irmo, mas ele depara com o Figuro 5, Leichter! Gneros: Anime Diretor: Kunihisa Sugishima, Hiroyuki Kakudo, Toru Yamada
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! - T03E11

Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demonaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E15

programme.title: 2010. A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mos de Naraku. Mas ela volta vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Ento, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela! Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E16

programme.title: 2010. Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que est bloqueando os poderes de Kagome. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E17

programme.title: 2010. Kohaku permanece inconsciente depois de ser encarado por Magatsuhi, a vontade do mal. Kagome est preocupada, mas ela tem que se curvar e estudar para os exames de admisso, ento ela decide voltar para casa. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E18

programme.title: 2010. Sesshoumaru persegue a m vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E19

programme.title: 2010. Naraku est atrs do ltimo fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refm. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: O Momento da Joia Ficar Completa
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E20

programme.title: 2010. Kagome se forma no ensino mdio e retorna era feudal. Shippo e Kohaku ficam na aldeia de Kaede, enquanto o resto da gangue se dirige para a batalha de Naraku. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E21

programme.title: 2010. O corao de Inuyasha devorado pelo veneno da Jia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demonaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escurido em seu corao toma conta dele. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E22

programme.title: 2010. Os poderes espirituais de Kagome so restaurados e a luz divina revivida na Jia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E23

programme.title: 2010. Naraku tem vivido como um demnio apesar de ter um corao humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E24

programme.title: 2010. Naraku se dirige para o Poo do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu ltimo desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E25

programme.title: 2010. Quando a ltima pessoa a obter a Jia Shikon faz o nico desejo correto, a jia ser purificada e desaparecer inteiramente deste mundo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fatima Noya (Sango), Favio Dias (Miroku/Mirok), Leticia Quinto (Kagome/Agome), Leticia Quinto (Kikyo), Mauro Lima (Inuyasha), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR - T01E26

programme.title: 2000. Anos aps ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai acordado por uma garota do ensino mdio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poo Come-Ossos. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Garota que Volta no Tempo e o Garoto Lacrado
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T01E01

programme.title: 2000. Concedido o poder de controlar Inuyasha, Agome descobre que ela pode ser a reencarnao da irm mais velha de Kaede, Kikyo, que selou Inuyasha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: As Pessoas Atrs da Joia de Quatro Almas
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T01E02

programme.title: 2000. Agome e Inuyasha precisam das habilidades do outro para reunir os fragmentos dispersos da Jia de Quatro Almas, mas os dois no se do bem. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Volta Atravs do Poo Come-Ossos
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T01E03

programme.title: 2000. De volta ao presente, Agome est relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procur-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura. programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T01E04

programme.title: 2000. O meio irmo de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo tmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha. programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T01E05

Gangs of New York (2002)
programme.desc: During the era of Tammany Halls sway, a young man (Leonardo DiCaprio) vows vengeance on the vicious gangster (Daniel Day-Lewis) who killed his father.

programme.title: The Other Guys (2010)
programme.desc: Two deskbound detectives get more than they bargain for when they take on a seemingly minor case that may turn out to be New Yorks biggest crime.

programme.title: Guns Up (2025)
programme.desc: After a job goes horribly wrong, a man who moonlights as a mob henchman has one night to get his family out of the city while keeping his dark secret hidden.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Scream 4 (2011)
programme.desc: The Ghostface Killer returns with a vengeance when self-help author Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) arrives in Woodsboro on the last stop of her book tour.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.sub-title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a traveling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)
programme.desc: A goofy janitor (David Spade) tells a radio talk-show host (Dennis Miller) about his search for the parents who abandoned him.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Black Rain (1989)
programme.desc: Two New York police detectives (Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia) take an underworld upstart back to Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead (1999)
programme.desc: After too many years on the job, an EMS paramedic (Nicolas Cage) begins an emotional descent during 56-hour tour.

programme.title: Good Kill (2014)
programme.desc: An Air Force drone pilot (Ethan Hawke) begins to question the ethics of dropping bombs on Afghanistan from the safety of his post in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact (1996)
programme.desc: Picard (Patrick Stewart), Riker (Jonathan Frakes) and the others set off to stop the half-robot Borg from sabotaging the first warp drive flight in 2063.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.title: The Road (2009)
programme.desc: A father (Viggo Mortensen) and his son (Kodi Smit-McPhee) try to keep the dream of civilization alive as they wander through a post-apocalyptic landscape.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: Backcountry (2014)
programme.desc: A couple (Missy Peregrym, Jeff Roop) on a deep-wilderness hike become hopelessly lost within an aggressive black bears territory.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: South Africas largest port city, Durban, forms a perfect melting pot of deep calm waters and warm currents, which in turn brings in the big game fish; its time to see what Durban has to offer!

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Tommo fishes the lower Zambezi River, staying on a live aboard boat and fishing with Cuan Meredith, the owner of River Gods adventures. They fish with baits, targeting a variety of species of fish, some of which are endemic to the lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: Majestic Mount Kenya rises to over 5000 meters and this magnificent monolithis often shrouded by mist and snow, hard to believe this close to the equator.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Fresh off their Lake Powell victory, Denis teams up once again with Austin and Rylan for a new adventure at Dworshak Reservoir in Idaho. Nestled in a rugged canyon, this lake delivers on its reputation with monster smallmouth bass.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild With Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Joe and Nick brave the frigid Arctic seas for the giant Atlantic halibut. Fish butchery lessons as Mike breaks down a 180lb halibut and cooks a festive Thors Hammer.

programme.desc: The wildest fishing to be found in Africa and the Indian Ocean.
